text: Salehale bhaneh ‘‘he mero kauma! Yasa kuratira vicara gara ki yadi masamga aphno palanakartako spasta pramana cha ra usale mala'i aphno tarphabata rahamata pradana gareko cha, ra pheri maile allahako adesa ullanghana garem bhane usako agadi kasale mero sahayata garnecha? Timile ta mero hanima vrd'dhi gariraheka chau.’’
